entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is a person who drew his wand and cast a Stunning Spell. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way as Xenophilius’s Stunning Spell soared across the room...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who realized their mistake just in time and launched himself sideways to save Ron and Hermione. (Chapter 21, 'Harry realized their mistake just in time: He launched himself sideways...')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who was saved by Harry from Xenophilius's Stunning Spell. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who was saved by Harry from Xenophilius's Stunning Spell. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way...')

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a person whose bed was hanging through the hole in the ceiling. (Chapter 21, 'The end of Luna’s bed was hanging through the hole.')

entities.name: rowena
entities.description: Rowena is a person whose bust is mentioned as being in the room. (Chapter 21, 'The bust of Rowena...')

entities.name: erumpent horn
entities.description: Erumpent horn is an object that Xenophilius's Stunning Spell hit. (Chapter 21, 'Xenophilius’s Stunning Spell soared across the room and hit the Erumpent horn.')

relationships.description: Xenophilius's Stunning Spell hit the Erumpent horn. (Chapter 21, 'Xenophilius’s Stunning Spell soared across the room and hit the Erumpent horn.')
Harry saved Ron from Xenophilius's Stunning Spell. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way...')
Harry saved Hermione from Xenophilius's Stunning Spell. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way...')
Xenophilius's Stunning Spell caused harm to Ron. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way...')
Xenophilius's Stunning Spell caused harm to Hermione. (Chapter 21, 'He launched himself sideways, shoving Ron and Hermione out of harm’s way...')
